@graph.name: Greek Souvlaki
@graph.description: Authentic Greek restaurant in Kafr Yasif. Souvlaki, gyros and traditional Greek dishes. Open Thu-Sat.

mainEntity.name: What are the restaurant opening hours?

acceptedAnswer.text: The restaurant is open Thursday to Saturday, from 1:00pm to 1:00am. Sunday to Wednesday we are closed.
The restaurant is located on Route 70, Kafr Yasif in Western Galilee. Easy to reach via Waze or Google Maps.

mainEntity.name: What is the price of souvlaki in pita?

acceptedAnswer.text: Souvlaki in pita starts at 30 ILS and includes Greek pita, skewer of choice, tzatziki/hot sauce, fresh vegetables and fries.

mainEntity.name: Are there vegan or gluten-free options?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! We have vegan souvlaki in pita (30 ILS) and also gluten-free pita option (40 ILS) with all skewer types.

mainEntity.name: How can I make a reservation?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can call 04-812-2980 or send a WhatsApp message. We recommend booking in advance for weekends.

mainEntity.name: What is the difference between souvlaki and gyros?

acceptedAnswer.text: Souvlaki is grilled meat skewer, while gyros (Greek shawarma) is meat sliced from a rotating spit. Both are served in Greek pita with vegetables and sauces.
